Params: {3: 'After noticing a surprise assault on Oasis by some wandering Corrupted, Watanabe leaves you right where you are by yourself.'}
{2: "Guess I'll stay put.", 3: '100', 4: 'I should go and see if I can help.', 5: '100'}
{3: 'Soldiers in Oasis are nervously preparing for the incoming attack.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'Build up a defense line at the back!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Construct Soldier', 3: 'Watch your surroundings! Beware of the Corrupted breaking through from the sides!', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Human Soldier', 3: "Ah? Aren't you the person next to Mr. Watanabe earlier?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: "Relax. Those Corrupted come every once in a while. We're already used to it.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'They might be scary, all these bloodthirsty, mindless Corrupted...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'But with Mr. Watanabe and the many Constructs here on our side...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'No harm will come to you! So just stay here and relax!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: "But once you're done resting, remember to contribute to Oasis as well!", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Human Soldier', 3: 'I should get going and assist them!', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Alright. Now, let me contribute as well!', 3: '23'}
